simlib.geometry.dot¶

simlib.geometry.dot(a, b, axis=1)[source]¶

Compute vector dot product.

Parameters

  • b (a,) – Vectors

  • axis (int) – Axis to apply sum over.

Returns

Vector dot product

Return type

float or numpy.ndarray
